name: Symmetry Discovery Quality Rubric
description: Evaluates the quality of symmetry discovery process and outputs

levels.1: Data type unclear, no domain context gathered
levels.2: Basic data type identified, minimal domain context
levels.3: Data type and task clearly identified, some domain context
levels.4: Comprehensive understanding of data, task, and domain constraints
levels.5: Deep domain understanding with relevant physical/mathematical context

levels.1: Only one or two transformations considered
levels.3: All relevant geometric transformations systematically tested
levels.5: Exhaustive coverage including subtle symmetries and combinations

levels.3: Clear reasoning for each claim with examples
levels.4: Strong domain-backed evidence for each symmetry

levels.1: No analysis of how outputs should transform
levels.3: Clear specification of output behavior for each symmetry
levels.4: Detailed output transformation with edge cases considered

levels.1: All claims treated as certain with no caveats
levels.2: Some uncertainty acknowledged but not detailed
levels.3: Confidence levels assigned to each symmetry
levels.4: Clear high/medium/low confidence with validation recommendations
levels.5: Detailed uncertainty analysis with specific validation steps

interpretation.1.0-2.0: Incomplete - restart with more thorough analysis
